p.d: A famous designer is found dead in a former chateau. Today a hotel, the building was once a brothel. The body was found in a secret hideaway. The victim was strangled and the autopsy reveals a child was born. A child not shown in the official records. Directed by: Nicolas Herdt (season 2, France, 2016) Screenplay: Baptiste Filleul, Marie-HÃ©lene Bizet Cast: Vanessa David (Margot Laurent), Julien Baumgartner (Arthur du Plessis), Christian Rauth (Stavros), Nathalie Blanc (the public prosecutor), Maud Forget (Garnier) Genre: detective Parental guidance: TV-PG
